ON PASSE DU BON TEMPS DESSUS

В жизни больше не куплю эту блядскую игру. Уважаемые Вальв, объясните мне, как сука работает ваша дебильная Анти-Чит система? Ваки летят налево и направо всем подряд! Покупайте эту игру, только если вам не жалко денег.
Игра прикольная.Но попадаются читеры и у тебя начинается дизмараль.И бесит дикрейт иногда.
Если читеры вам попадаются крайне редко, а сами вы играете на достаточно хорошем уровне, то игра очень даже неплоха.
JOGO BOM SO E PENA TER MUITOS HACKERS

One of the best FPS games
Highly skilled based

EDIT:
Value has decreased alot, not worth the headache, maybe a good engine and tool to train your core FPS skill? but i dont see the point in even doing that. Valve ruined a lot of potential just like they always do. really sad.
Great game with a lot of skill involved!
still a good game im just downvoting it for fun

An excellent game that allows you to develop a reaction. It has both normal players and non-normal ones. Of course, there are times when you get very angry, but you want to play and you continue. That's all.
tira os hackes e o jogo que apaixou muitos

Estoy muy viciado,  muy buen juego pero hay que jugar mucho

Jogão massa pra qnd ce tem que esperar dar a hora de ir trabalhar ou descontar a raiva em personagens 3D falando russo xingano sua mãe.
hard to get into, but once you do, it will be a fun game. Should use smgs when you first start since they are ez.
Das spiel macht spaß aber die hacker regen auf

Pire anti-cheat, pire système de matchmaking, pire serveurs, pire latence, ce jeu a tout réunis pour être le gros fdp du FPS, mais c'est moi le fdp qui continue a y jouer parce que j'èspere que tout soit réglé un jour ou l'autre.

Ca coute vraiment si cher que ca de faire un serveur pour les russes ? ( sachant que les caisses vous rapporte plus que vous investissez dans ce jeu )

Changer en 128 tick, la normal aujourd'hui mais vous vous en tamponner les burnes des joueurs.

Un anti-cheat à la Valorant ferait pas de mal, ça réduirait le plus grand nombres de cheaters.

refaire a zéro le système de matchmaking parce que là c'est trop.

Vous lirez jamais ça mais putain faites quelque chose pour ce monument du jeu bordel...

Hohoho how many different thoughts I have. Remember playing around 2015 and 2017 it was one of the best games ever but unfortunatelly it's like cheaters' sandbox now. Valve decided pay no attention to its anticheat and here we are. Every match I face with a guy that tend to use additional soft. Due all these problems I gotta say that we have lost our favourite game and I'll delete it very soon...
the best game in the world
